overview: Adios... Puta Madres is a live album by Ministry, released on March 31, 2009 on 13th Planet Records. The album was recorded at various locations on Ministry's farewell tour, dubbed the "C U LaTouR". AMG music database and Windows Media database incorrectly list the title of the record as "Adios...Putas Madres."
title: Ministry: Adios... Puta Madres
